Jan Dennison

Looking for Work

Hello Hello

Pleased to see you! I'm Jan Dennison, a Front-End Developer and fellow human, taking the next step in my career. Many people have asked what I'm looking for, so I'm writing up some basics for ease of reference. Take a look, and if you think we might be a good match, feel free to contact me at jldennison.contact@gmail.com

Many head nods to Julie Pagano for the idea

First Things

Let's save some time with a few easy links for those of you into that sort of thing. You can learn a lot of buzzwords about me in a very short amount of time!

My Resume My LinkedIn My GitHub My DEVOLIO

The Ideal Position

As someone who loves both code and design, I am one of those people who can bridge the two worlds. I have worked on projects throughout the stack, but Front-End is my happy place and where my greatests strengths lie.

  • Front-End Development, Full Stack with focus on Front-End, or Front-End/UX Design combination
  • Local to Columbus, OH -or-
  • Support remote employees / distributed offices
  • Direct hire (not contracting)

About Me

In addition to my technical skills reference in my resume and LinkedIn profile, I bring a lot to the table. My background spans 10+ years of both direct and indirect experience in the professional world.

  • 2 years Front-End Developer
  • 3 years HTML, CSS, Wordpress, Web Hosting, Web Design, Graphic Design (direct employment and freelance)
  • 6 years Biodefense Research Associate, with DOD Secret clearance and DOJ Select Agent clearance

As we both know, experience and soft skills are hard to quantify but equally as important in the workplace. Here are some things that are true about me:

  • I am highly empathetic, inclusive, thoughtful
  • I value integrity and honesty
  • I can look at complex information and form the broader picture
  • I am very adaptable, flexible, and persistent
  • I like to be helpful and jump in where needed
They feel like buzzwords when I write them, but they are no less true for the telling.

I love web development because it's the portal between the user and information, which creates opportunities to delight the one and facilitate the other. The user experience is ever-evolving as tech grows and is integrated more and more in our lives. This presents fascinating puzzles that must be met not just with design, performance, and accessibility, but also caring.

About You

The most important things I'm looking for in a company are:

  • Culture

    I'm looking for places that actively foster:

    • Collaboration and Respect - across roles, departments, and job titles
    • Employee Health - including work/life balance and mental health
    • Continued Education - be it through mentoring, attending conferences, paying for classes, hosting groups, etc

  • Mission

    In "job listing" speak: Bonus points if your company:

    • Does good in the world through product or philanthropy
    • Focuses on the Users through active research and feedback loops
    • Makes fairness and transparency company values

Contact Me

As I mentioned, if you think my skills and your needs are a great fit, send me an email! jldennison.contact@gmail.com

No recruiters or contracting positions, please.

This site is designed to be responsive, HTML5 validated, CSS validated, optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements. It's also a github.io site with Jekyll blog integration.
